channel.title: The Spark Gap
channel.itunes:summary:
Karl and Corey talk about various aspects of embedded electronics, from nuts and bolts design to high-level discussions and debates. We also talk about some of our hobbies surrounding electronics (3D Printing and CNC Routers).
New episodes are released Wednesdays.
channel.itunes:author: The Spark Gap
channel.description: Karl and Corey talk about various aspects of embedded electronics.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast discussing the nuts and bolts of embedded electronics, the systems that use them, and the community that surrounds them.

item.title: The Spark Gap - Episode 53
item.description: Karl and Corey talk about projects they've been working on in their spare time.  Corey discusses his ping pong scoreboard's progress and challenges.
item.content:encoded: Karl and Corey talk about projects they've been working on in their spare time.  Corey discusses his ping pong scoreboard's progress and challenges.
item.itunes:subtitle: Project updates - Part 1

item.title: The Spark Gap - Episode 52
item.description: Karl and Corey discuss how to work with development kits, specifically on how to best transition from a dev kit to a custom design.
item.content:encoded: Karl and Corey discuss how to work with development kits, specifically on how to best transition from a dev kit to a custom design.
item.itunes:subtitle: Working with Dev Kits
